name: Images Only Dark Pinterest
description:
This is a mix of thwo styles :
https://userstyles.org/styles/106179/pinterest-gray-theme
https://userstyles.org/styles/111439/pinterest-images-only
Thanks to Valacar the author of theses two styles !

I added little adjustments for personal use but I thought I'd share.
additional_info:
Changes from original style by Valacar :

Kept the pin / like / send / edit buttons when hovering
Dark background added for the "discover" part
